mapper.select: SELECT qna_num, view_num, title, input_date, flag FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, qna_num, view_num, title, input_date, flag FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY input_date DESC) AS view_num, qna_num, title, input_date, flag FROM qna where user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY input_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endItemIndex} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startItemIndex}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, qna_num, view_num, title, input_date, flag FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY input_date DESC) AS view_num, qna_num, title, input_date, flag FROM qna where user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY input_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endItemIndex} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startItemIndex}

select qna.category, qna.input_date, qna.title, qna.content, qna.flag, qna_answer.ans_title, qna_answer.reply_date, qna_answer.ans_content from qna left join qna_answer on qna.qna_num = qna_answer.qna_num where qna.qna_num = #{qna_num}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_num, category, title, content) values ((select count(*)+1 from qna), #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
